gameDetail.gDetail: Deep in the forest of Lolite Lakes holds a secret that only few anglers know about. Sweet Fish Odyssey is a SHUMP (shoot 'em up) which you play Chico,the unbelevably strong parakeet, who just grabbed the greatest fish known to man, the Golden Aura Catfish. Little is known about this great creature but it seems to have the power to attract other wild life to it, for it's benefit or their tasty meal for the day. Luckly it can eat anything it can fit in its mouth and use that enegry to shoot down those predators it can't eat. All Chico needs to do is make it back to the boat...

Help these little hoppers cross the canyon by moving the lilynimbus pads and catching them along the way. Watch out for falling space junk!! A game inspired by those old panic type Game and Watch games.
Did it for a game jam. I had to create a game inspired by the infamous Flappy Bird. Which means mostly ripping off other game assets and keeping the gameplay simple and unforgiving.
It's a bullet hell based on dreams.

CONTROLS: Movement: Arrows or WASD J(tap):Power Shot J:(Hold):Wideshot K:BulletParry SPACEBAR:Pholey Cannon MECHANICS: When you're hit by a PURPLE bullet you have a chance to parry it by pressing K. Successful parries creates dream cores. The more dream cores you collect the bigger your Pholey cannon blast.
First attempt at a horizontal SHUMP. You're Ken, technical director at CapCorp who is just about to head home after a long day. That is, until the security system malfunctions...

Reach the right of the stage before the gate closes MOVEMENT: WASD J: Shoot left K: Shoot right OTHER NOTES: This game was my first attempt at Sprite blitting . I wanted alot of bullets and though this was the way to squeeze out more performance but it's not the case after reading into it more
First attempt at a vertical SHUMP. You're a Security maintnence ship that gets caught in the middle of a security system gone haywire.
INSTRUCTIONS: Reach the top of the screen before the end gate closes. CONTROLS: Arrows:Movement Z: Star Shot X: Single Shot
A single screen arcade game where you control a crane to lift boxes and drop them on the heads of cargo trolls.
CONTROLS: Movement:WASD Left Click: Lower Crane

Came up with this idea on Valentines day. Eros is tasked to expose the broken hearts of the brokenhearted and repair them. You have to shoot the heartbroken to expose their heart. Touch it to repair it.
CONTROLS: Movement: WASD J(tap): Normal shot J(hold & release)Pierce Shot
A wrestling themed beat 'em up. Got some plans with this idea.
CONTROLS: Movement: WASD I:chop Attack J: Grapple Dash:double tap A or D (try dashing into the turnbuckle)
Monty the treasure hunter has now challenged the Tower! Will he survive with the booty AND his booty intact?

CONTROLS: Movement: WASD 1,2 or 3: use corresponding item slot Left Click: select Tile/grab coins MECHANICS: Match two tiles that are free(tiles can only be selected if it's left or right side has no tiles and isn't under any tile, clear mounds as quickly as possible to reach the next floor. Match gems to get items!
An open cave game where you have to rely on echo location and memory to move around.
